title: Al-Shohada'a Stadium
text: Al-Shohada'a Stadium is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Zinjibar%2C%20Abyan">Zinjibar, Abyan</a>, <a href="Yemen">Yemen</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and serves as the home stadium of <a href="Hassan%20%28Yemen%20football%20club%29">Hassan</a>. The stadium holds 15,000 people. The architect was Michael KC Cheah, known for his portfolio of stadiums across Asia and the Middle-East.
